ovdesc.p: This screen is used to setup details of a company inside payments hub. A record authorised in this screen, creates or amends or deletes a record in store table, PPT.COMPANY.

desc.p: Mentions the timestamp when the SOD started.
Name or description of the enterprise. The enterprise is the legal entity under which the company resides.
Indicates the unique ID of the enterprise. The enterprise is the legal entity under which the company resides.
Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
Date cannot be equal to or greater than today.
Date cannot be equal to or less than today.
Denotes the time difference between the time at which the company is operating and the actual system time.
This field holds a 6 character value.
Blank values instead of the sign signifies +
Used for internal purpose. Holds the ID of the previous live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.

Contains all the override messages which the user agreed to during Input. During the validation of a transaction, the system may provide the user with a series of screen override messages to indicate an anomaly.
Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
The value is not editable by the user.
Used for internal purpose. Value of this field determines values of fields, 'RAC' and 'RSC'
This field can hold upto 1 alphanumeric character and the value is not editable by the user.
Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
The value is not editable by the user.
Indicates the status of SOD or COB for a company
"SOD" - Start of Day process is running
"COB" - Close of Business process is running
"Active" - Between SOD and COB. The company is active and ready for processing daily transactions.
The value is system generated and not editable by the user.
Indicates the company code of the company for which the record is created.
The value links to the field 'CompanyCode' in PPT.COMPANY
Indicates the company ID for which the record is created.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
Date cannot be less than today.
Used for internal purpose.Holds the ID of the current live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
Mentions the timestamp when the COB ended
Mentions the timestamp when the SOD ended.
Mentions the timestamp when the COB started
